name: Above the Void (MiltonNH25)
description:
Above the Void is a tile-based puzzle game where you must carefully maneuver around the level to avoid falling into the void.  On your way, you will find additional skills to aid you in reaching the end. 

The game included 10+ levels to solve and some additional remixed levels available after you finish.

WASD/Arrows to move, Shift to use powers, Space to select/use grapple, F to toggle fullscreen.

V1.1 Post-Jam Update:

-Fixed diagonal moving bug

-Fixed moving directly after a grapple bug

-Added saving and the ability to continue when reopening the game

-Increased the speed of the grapple


A Game by MiltonNH25, Choco, and Xander Ton
